== Description ==
Computes an offset in seconds from an ISO 8601 timezone.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php iso8601_timezone_to_offset( $timezone ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$timezone|string|Either 'Z' for 0 offset or 'Â±hhmm'.}}

== Return Values ==
; (integer&#124;float) : The offset in seconds.
